text:
Pitbull accepts the latin AMA Dick Clark achievement award at the Latin American Music Awards at the Dolby Theatre on Thursday, Oct. 26, 2017, in Los Angeles.

Chris Pizzello / Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP
title: Pitbull at Latin American Music Awards: Build More Schools, Not Walls

og.title: 'Dale!': Pitbull offers Latinos words of encouragement, jabs Trump at Latin American Music Awards
og.description: Pitbull receives the Dick Clark Achievement award at the 2017 Latin American Music Awards and delivers a powerful acceptance speech.
